_comment: This file is a template and schema guide for messMenu.json. DO NOT EDIT THE LIVE APP's DATA HERE. Copy these structures into the main file.

versions._comment: Each version is an independent snapshot of the menu. It should contain all relevant data for that version. It does not depend on previous versions. It should follow below structure. Each and every meal should be listed under its respective day and category. If you want to do patches use the 'overrides' section.

common_items.Breakfast: (e.g) Brown Bread, Butter, Jam, Tea, Coffee and Milk, Sugar
common_items.Lunch: (e.g) Plain Rice, Phulka, Curd, Salt, Sugar, Papad/ Fryums
common_items.Dinner: (e.g) Plain Rice, Sugar, Salt, Papad/ Fryums

Meal: Don't forget to add *Item 3* * to spcl items like non veg

YYYY-MM-DD._comment: Permanent change from this date onwards. Use this for small, official menu patches. This will NOT carry over to a new base version.

eventOverrides.eventName: Name of the event (e.g., Ganesh Chaturthi)
eventOverrides.description: Optional: A brief, general description of the event if needed.

rules.targetMeal: The meal to be changed (e.g., Dinner)
rules.sourceDay: The day to copy the menu FROM (e.g., Friday)
rules.description: Optional: A specific message for this day's banner.
A special festival lunch is being served.
